description:
A more tapered version of the beloved Mica Pants, these joggers are ready for rock, rivers, and trails. Durable fabric stands up to scratchy underbrush or grainy quartzite. The elastic waist does away with unnecessary zippers or buttons, and sits nicely under a harness, and a hit of stretch provides excellent movement and ease.

  • Made of durable ripstop nylon and spandex, with recycled content
  • Durable water repellent (DWR) finish provides weather protection against unexpected showers
  • Elastic hems seal out bugs
  • Gusseted crotch for unrestricted movement
  • Elastic waist with external drawcord and faux fly
name: MEC Mica Joggers - Men's
